name: Hide First Image In Post
author: KWS Adams

sections.description:
Hide First Image In Post is a popular WordPress plugin which hides the first image in a post. Whether you want to temporarily hide or permanently hide the first image in your posts, this plugin will do the work.

This plugin is designed to help you remove the first image in content. If having duplicate images is your problem, this will help you solve it.
sections.installation: Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly. Activate the Plugin from Plugins page and instantly all first images in posts will be hidden upon post refreshing.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly. Activate the Plugin from Plugins page and instantly all first images in posts will be hidden upon post refreshing.

Does the Plugin require additional configurations?

No. This plugin will work instantly upon activation. No additional setups required.

Are images deleted permanently?

No. Images are simply hidden. You can restore them by deactivating the plugin.
